    • Constructor Detail

      • NPC

        public NPC(@NotNull
           @NotNull java.lang.String displayName,
           org.bukkit.Location location,
           boolean visibleOnTab,
           org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver)
        Instantiates a new NPC.
        Parameters:
        displayName - the name witch will be visible above the NPC's head. Cannot be null.
        location - the location where the NPC will be located. Cannot be null.
        visibleOnTab - weather the NPC will be visible on the player list. Cannot be null.
        receiver - the player that will see the NPC. Cannot be null.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        NotNull

    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        public void spawn()
        Spawns the NPC and calls the NPCSpawnEvent.
        If visibleOnTab is equal to true the NPC will be added to the tablist.
        If visibleOnTab is equal to false the NPC will be removed from the tablist within 2 ticks (~ 0.1s)
        Specified by:
        spawn in interface AbstractNPC
        Since:
        1.0

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys the NPC and calls the NPCDestroyEvent.
        Specified by:

        Since:

        Specified by:
        teleport in interface AbstractNPC
        Parameters:
